location-applied.legend: Where did you make your application?

same-address-radio.legend: Is your address the same as the address on the delivery letter?

uk-address-radio.legend: Is there a suitable UK address we can deliver your BRP to?
uk-address-radio.hint: If you need a replacement BRP, we will post it to a UK address of your preference. If you don't have a suitable UK address, we will deliver it to a Post Office for collection.

nationality.label: Country of nationality
nationality.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

none.label: I don’t have any of these

validation.required: Select whether or not you have a reference number

use-address.label: I want to be contacted by post

error-selection.legend: What’s the problem with your BRP?
error-selection.hint: You can select more than one option.

last-name-error.label: What is your correct family name?
last-name-error.hint: This is the first line under 'name' on your BRP.

first-name-error.label: What are your correct given name(s)?
first-name-error.hint: This is the second line under 'name' on your BRP.

birth-place-error.label: What is your correct place of birth?

date-of-birth-error.label: What is your correct date of birth?

sponsor-details-error.hint: This is the third line under 'remarks' on your BRP. This is the reference number of your employer, university or college.
sponsor-details-error.label: What is the correct sponsor reference number?

nationality-error.label: What is your correct nationality?
nationality-error.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

signature-error.label: What is wrong with your signature?

photograph-error.label: What is wrong with your photograph?

national-insurance-error.label: What is your correct National Insurance number?

length-of-stay-error.label: Describe the problem
length-of-stay-error.hint: You do not need to report an error if your BRP expires on 31 December 2024 but your immigration status allows you to stay longer. You will not need a BRP from 1 January 2025. You’ll be able to prove your immigration status online, without a BRP. UKVI will update their information on how to prove your immigration status in early 2024. You do not need to do anything and your immigration status will not be affected.

org-help.legend: Are you completing this form on behalf of the BRP holder?
org-help.hint: Friends, relatives, employers, charity workers and lawyers, for example, can complete this form on behalf of the BRP holder.
